greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} (1 - 2x^k).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000 (terms 0..1000 from Giovanni Resta)
mathematica: a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ -QPochhammer[2, x], {x, 0, n}]; (* _Michael Somos_, Mar 11 2014 *)
program: (PARI) N=66; q='q+O('q^N); Vec(sum(n=0, N, (-2)^n*q^(n*(n+1)/2) / prod(k=1, n, 1-q^k ) )) \\ _Joerg Arndt_, Mar 09 2014
(PARI) N=66; q='q+O('q^N); t2=Vec( prod(k=1, N, 1-2*q^k) ) \\ _Joerg Arndt_, Mar 11 2014
results.author: Sharon Sela (sharonsela(AT)hotmail.com), May 24 2002
ext: Edited by _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 26 2002
